reviewText: Great reminder for those of us who went to Grandma and Grandpa's for Sunday dinner in the '70's  and watched old war movies while digesting lunch.
Title: British War Collection

reviewText: A good addition to any classic WW II video collection. I really enjoyed the storylines and the acting is pretty good.
Title: British War Collection

reviewText: The three were well performed, interesting, and offering a window into a part of the war effort that I was not aware of.
Title: British War Collection

reviewText: These movies have the stories, and the actors, some before they became International BlockBusters in the film industry.If You like these Movies from this ERA, Don't let these fall thrugh the cracks in your collection. This item was one stop shopping for bonnus extra films. Arrived packaged for safety,arrived quicker then expected. All combined to make this seller five Star
Title: British War Collection

reviewText: This set is well worth buying. Good British drama at its best. A must have for all war film buffs
Title: British War Collection

reviewText: my rating is based on cost vs benefit. i already had "malta story" will keep" sea of sand" and give away the other two. standard ww2 fare made before improvements in filming. acting decent.
Title: British War Collection
